node.excerpt: Until now I was only using setInterval not being aware of setTimeout. frontmatter.title: Understanding CSS display: inline; block; inline-block

node.excerpt: When styling elements on a page it's important to understand what kind of elements these are. Inline elements Inline elements are elements that can be put inside block elements without taking a new line. An example of such elements are links <a>that can be inserted for example in titles or paragraphs or <span>.   Another inline element is an image…
